name: Life Choices Simulator
description:
Good or evil, party or study. The choices are yours to make, in Life Choices Simulator!

A new simulation game all about choosing your path through life, Life Choices Simulator is about the big and little wins.

Will you be innocent and follow the good pat, or have some fun on the way to Hell? The choice is yours! Be careful though, the path you take decides how your next life will turn out!

Life Choices Simulator features:
-Multiple exciting levels
-Make choices!
Decide your fate
